title: Curved serif
content:
I came across this font and have lost the link! All I have is this screengrab. I would've found it on a type website that allows you to type in your own word to preview. I've searched myfonts and dafont and found similar but not this EXACT one. Please help!

Font: 

 My Fair Cody 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317065143/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [what font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317065143/http:/typophile.com/files/what%20font_5.jpg) | 23.87 KB |
author: Crackerjacker

comments.content: About Letters My Fair Cody: [free for personal use](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317065143/http:/www.dafont.com/my-fair-cody.font)/ [commercial licence](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317065143/http:/shop.aboutletters.com/)
Ryuk, you are my hero :) Thank you!
